event_registry_properties.name: title
description
event_registry_properties.item: External sensors indicate that a power supply is no longer operating correctly.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item: No additional information is available at this time.
event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Check to see if the power cord is connected properly. Replace the power supply if the internal mechanism has failed.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: The enclosure may be getting inadequate power. Subsequent loss of power supplies may force the enclosure to shutdown.
event_registry_properties.name: response
